content:
In the area of responsibility of the Defense Forces of the South of Ukraine on the Left Bank, Ukrainian defenders destroyed 41 occupiers and 4 enemy observation posts per day.

About this in TelegramReportsPress Service of Defense Forces of South of Ukraine.

The command noted that the forces of defense continue to cause fire damage to the locations of the enemy, fire positions and rear.

In particular, the last day was confirmed that on the left bank the enemy has become less than 1 gun, 10 units of automotive equipment and 5 boats.

As reported by ArmyInform, 45 units of Russian equipment were destroyedIn the Tavriya directionfor the age.
title: On the Dnieper Left Bank, our units were neutralized by more than 40 Russians and 4 observation points
description: The press service of defense forces of southern Ukraine informs about it in the telegram. In the command ...
author: Army Inform
